data.description:
Step into the world of Lightspeed VR, where speed and precision are your best allies. This exhilarating VR experience is crafted for those who crave the thrill of high-speed challenges and the satisfaction of mastering complex courses. In Lightspeed VR, you’ll find yourself racing against the clock through a series of stunning, immersive environments.

Navigate through intricate pathways, dodge dynamic obstacles, and make split-second decisions to shave milliseconds off your time. Each level presents unique challenges that test your reflexes and push your skills to the limit. From neon-lit cityscapes to treacherous mountain trails, every setting is meticulously designed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Compete against friends and players worldwide on the global leaderboards. Track your progress, perfect your techniques, and uncover hidden shortcuts to gain the competitive edge. With intuitive controls and realistic physics, Lightspeed VR offers an unparalleled sense of speed and immersion.

Whether you’re a seasoned speedrunner or a newcomer looking for a pulse-pounding VR adventure, Lightspeed VR delivers an unforgettable ride. Are you ready to embrace the challenge and become the fastest racer in the virtual realm? Strap on your Meta Quest headset and dive into the lightning-fast world of Lightspeed VR today!

changelog.change_log: This update fixed the online players.
The new update includes a fix to the public button as well as adding in an online players counter.
The new release brings fixes for the cosmetics, as well as some minor changes with the text in the game.
